original_text: My body is not there with you, but I think about you a lot. I hear that you are living and working well together. I also hear that you continue to trust Christ strongly. That makes me very happy.
korean_text: 이는 내가 육신으로는 떠나 있으나 심령으로는 너희와 함께 있어 너희가 질서 있게 행함과 그리스도를 믿는 너희 믿음이 굳건한 것을 기쁘게 봄이라

sentences.original_text: My body is not there with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내 육신은 너희와 함께 있지 않지만

sentences.original_text: but I think about you a lot
I hear that you are living and working well together
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 잘 지내고 함께 일한다고 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: I also hear that you continue to trust Christ strongly
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 너희가 계속 그리스도를 굳게 믿고 있다고 들었습니다
